StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateMUDNo.fyFlag]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Type varchar(1)
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET @TYPE = UPPER(@Type)
IF @TYPE = 'N' BEGIN --- SET THE NOTIFY FLAG TO TRUE FOR NEW ZIPCODES UPDATE MUD_NEW_ZIPCODES SET NOTIFY_FLAG = 1, USER_LOGIN = 'SA', UPDATE_DATE = GetDate()
END
IF @TYPE = 'A' BEGIN UPDATE MUD_ARCHIVED_ZIPCODES SET NOTIFY_FLAG = 1, USER_LOGIN = 'SA', UPDATE_DATE = GetDate() END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
